room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: What a great way to spend a night with friends when you're looking for something different! We went through the Slaycation room at Planet Deadline and although we didn't escape we were close. Can't wait to come back and try a new room!

room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was an awesome experience. Took all the kids. We chose the Colorado Slaycation. Way fun, challenging, exciting and we are planning the next one.

room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: "A Colorado Slaycation" was the best escape room I've ever done! All the puzzles actually go with the theme of the room... and the decorations and props were amazing. I really felt like I was in a cabin in the woods/murder house.

room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We played Staycation. Definitely one of better escape rooms around town!

room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This place is amazing! Very suspenseful, hard puzzles, and well put together. Will be going back there soon!

room_title: Escape room "A Colorado Slaycation" by Planet Deadline Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: First time doing an escape room and we loved it! We did Slaycation for a birthday and it was challenging and fun.
